page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: Ullesthorpe C of E{Primary School}was built in 1975 on the site of the old cattle market.It replaced the old school in Mill Road which was first established in 1843.The School provides education for 5_11 year old {children}who live in the village. There are three teachers,Mrs Leat(Class 1,Infants),Mrs Stokes,(Headteacher,Class 2,Lower Juniors) and Mr Marjoram(Deputy Headteacher,Class 3,Upper Juniors). We do number work and English and reading in the mornings(except part of Tuesday when we go swimming at Lutterworth Swimming Pool) and Science,art and project work in the afternoons. About 25 children pay for{school {meals}(58p/day) and the remainder bring sandwiches. All meals are eaten in the school hall.
